lenders.name: Elizabeth

lenders.occupational_info: I work with non-profit hospitals and health systems

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people reach their dreams.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I really feel like no one wants a hand out but that many people are willing to accept a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a municipal recreation department.  My job consists of making sure the department stays with in budget while continuing to serve our mission of improving the quality of life for our citizens.

lenders.name: Nermeen & Jose Javier

lenders.occupational_info: Working at a community college, I work with a diverse population of students by helping them plan for academic and career success.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I think this site is a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day and tell it what to do.

lenders.name: David

lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lenders.name: Derek

lenders.occupational_info: Murder and Robbery

lenders.name: Terry & Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. There is nothing better than helping another human being achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves putting health care services in place that help a person maintain their health within the setting of their choice.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I dream of becoming a typhoon and a magnet.
lenders.occupational_info:
My job:
step #1: The client tells me what he wants.
step #2: I write computer programs.
step #3: The client now wants something else.
step #4: Go to step #1.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I feel like it.
lenders.occupational_info: I deal with planting trees, grasses, plantlife in arranged, visually appealing ways.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I train others in how to write an amazing resume, how to interview, tricks to getting jobs in this market as well as training managers and supervisors in communication, conflict resolution, leadership and performance management. I work with high risk kids during the summer giving them the tools they need to get a job and change their lives as well look at options of college, trade school and various occupations

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to let people have the opportunity to gain pride in building a business that supports their family.  One day, they may be lending to help someone else build their business!
lenders.occupational_info: As an accountant, I manage and track monies for small businesses.

lenders.name: Cultural Connections
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people.

lenders.name: Dustin

lenders.name: R&A
lenders.loan_because: We've been blessed and want to help others.

lenders.name: Orson

lenders.occupational_info: I am an employee with 3 children, I am working at one of Oil Company as Production Technician

lenders.occupational_info: We're a web developing business creating websites for other businesses. To expand their exposure to the world.

lenders.name: P & M
lenders.loan_because: from little things big things grow.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I want to support good people for whom temporary support will provide a much needed opportunity to further their success and improvement.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a science teacher interested in experimental biology.  I am a scientist with an interested in lipids and their application.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: So as to encourage self sufficiency

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I like to see the difference one person can make.
lenders.occupational_info: In addition to being a frequent lender, I also volunteer as a Kiva loan editor.

lenders.name: Thread Yourself
lenders.loan_because: At Thread Yourself we're entrepreneurs in the t-shirt design industry, trying to make a living doing something we love - designing t-shirts. Since we have been able to make a few dollars we're happy to donate a portion to other entrepreneurs as well. Beginning this year, we are donating 5% of our total monthly revenue to entrepreneurs in developing countries through Kiva.

lenders.name: Joyful Heart
lenders.loan_because: It's my job to!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell antiques. It's exciting to stumble upon new things, that are actually very old things, imagine their past, research their histories, then share with others who have a great respect for it. it's my way of preserving history, connecting with the past and looking forward into my future.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: People who didn't know me helped me when I needed help.  This is my way to pay it forward.  I hope to spread the feeling of gratitude and abundance that I feel every day.
lenders.occupational_info: The left-brain side of me is a technical writer and editor who works on technical manuals.  The right-brain part of me is an artist who paints on commission -- landscapes, wildlife, and murals.  The outside-of-my-brain part (LOL) is the psychic part that does remote viewing, energy healing, and intuitive services.

lenders.name: tim
lenders.loan_because: People are good investments.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in research competitiveness to advance science and serve society.

lenders.name: Ryan

lenders.name: Wil
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this kind of assistance

lenders.name: Vincent

lenders.occupational_info: Trying to be as honest as one can be.

lenders.name: Michal
lenders.loan_because: You can give someone fish in order to eat. You can give someone a fishing rod in order to catch his own. Or you can lend someone the means to start a small-scale fishing business!
lenders.occupational_info: Developing software for healthcare.

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: I like grassroots movements.

lenders.name: Phil

lenders.occupational_info: I own a small business selling pesticides and fertilisers to Australian wheat farmers.

lenders.name: Abi

i do psychotherapy in schools with children who have emotional and behavioral problems.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach first grade in Utah!

lenders.loan_because: it sounds like a good idea

lenders.name: Bill

lenders.name: Donn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others vanquish suffering and pursue happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I work every day for keep my community safe, and to achieve equal rights for lesbian and gay people.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky in my personal and professional life, I want to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Dorrel Rhodes
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs grow their business.
lenders.occupational_info: To provide a source of funds to small business.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have enough food to eat and a safe place to live. I know that even lending a little is an excellent way to empower talented people with limited resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct research on economic trends, social inequality and public policy.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I can try to help others as I've been helped in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have owned a business-to-business delivery & courier service since 1986.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: We are all sisters and brothers.
lenders.occupational_info: Teach at a university.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired to do so by a very special individual!  Oh and I believe in helping others!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom teaching the as much as I can to this sweet child!

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because:
I think everyone deserves the opportunity to grow and improve their own personal circumstances, whether they have nothing or whether they are millionaires already!

Oh, and I believe that what you give, you get back multiplied!

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: To be able to make a difference in a person's life is a wonderful thing.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: it might help.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I am self-employed - and I know that it means a lot to be a part of a network that helps each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I am helping children, young people and adults to find ways to use their ressources and competences.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by Dambisa Moyo's endorsement of Kiva.org in a New York Times interview as a way to truly help the poor in Africa.
lenders.occupational_info: I do scientific research in an immunology laboratory of a large academic institution.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because:
I work with local families who need help here in my community.  I would like to also help others around the world.  

**My first loan was a gift to me from my good friend Shannon, so I could give back**

lenders.name: Carlene
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. I am lucky to have a job and other opportunities. I want to share that good luck.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children (12-18) how to write in English.

lenders.name: Johna
lenders.loan_because: My husband Bob has been enjoying giving through Kiva for over a year, and I want to participate too.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people sell their home or property, and also help others to find a home or land to build on. I own my real estate company along with my mother, sister and son, so I understand the small business costs and working to help your family.

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: Try to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: Help people and small businesses to have a nice professional presence on the Internet.

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: i am here to awaken from the illusion of our separateness
lenders.occupational_info: i am a teacher and coach by vocation and aspire to be part of the solution of world poverty by avocation

lenders.name: Lorra
lenders.loan_because: If an industrious person needs a little help and you are in a position to provide it;  you should do it in honour of all the people who have helped you find your own path in this world.  Hopefully you will inspire recepients to do the same.  Kiva gives us the opportunity to help, which is better than a handout, and leave the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I identify where two businesses could make more profit if they work together instead of working independently

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: It is so good!
lenders.occupational_info: Corp Finance- China

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the Kiva dream and that all people can be successful if they have the resources to pursue their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with organizations that promote better housing and financial stability for families.

lenders.name: Carlene
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I own several  internet websites that have become very successful selling hand and power tools, Japanese Koi

lenders.name: FriendofFella
lenders.loan_because: I so very much want the world to be a fairer place.  And more selfishly, I loan because I believe that the only chance we have of ever having real peace on earth is if we strive together to eradicate poverty and inequity here, first.
lenders.occupational_info:
And I want that real peace, as I want EVERY human being to have plentiful opportunities for a good life - and opportunities for real hope and for real joy -    I want that more than I could ever say.

And so, most likely, would that fine-looking fella in the picture, were he not so utterly preoccupied with fetching sticks, chasing ducks, stalking squirrels, and trying to heft his 70 pound oversized self into my lap.

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: My niece is very interesting and generous and gave me a gift of being able to give a Kiva loan. I was always really impressed with the micro loan.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I have a job in an office. I sit at a computer and make work with television stations and ad agencies to make sure that their advertisements play. I don't see the adds or the shows I put them in. It's rather boring and my friends and family don't really get what I'm doing. I like it. And it pays my rent. I've been a musician and traveled a lot doing that and I prefer this, being in one place near my friends and family. I love playing music but found traveling so much very stressful.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I can. And I love people's stories!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn to save and use their money to take care of their families and accomplish their goals in life. I also love to read and travel.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in helping out someone less fortunate than I, and I'm very entreprenurial in spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I market and sell a product for my company. Our product involves recruiting participants who are interested in participating in surveys, specifically in surveys done over the Internet.

lenders.name: Johannes
lenders.loan_because: I am happy because money goes to real people.  Foreign aid often buys foreign weapons to kill people.  Who needs that?  I wish other people success, and Kiva lets me put my money where my mouth is.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: To lift others up, as Jesus has lifted Me up.

lenders.name: William Palmer
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together
lenders.occupational_info: I work with companies and individuals to help them realize their full potential

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business. I wish there had been a place like this for me when i needed working capital. Now that I am up and running I want to give something back to this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair and build computers. I am a programmer and a network engineer.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a difference through those who want the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people talk with each other

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because: I love loaning to people very much because I feel great that I am helping someone that needs money.*

lenders.name: cam
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I really want to make the world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school every day and learn how to do new things

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: loans have helped me.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I respect the efforts of hard working people and want to help them in their pursuits.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children, ages 3 to 5 years; some have disabilities.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I am honored to have the opportunity to so easily help someone who is working hard to better their lives and the lives of those around them.  Why would I hoard my money when someone else needs it, and can put it to so much better use than my back account?

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I can; it feels good; and, a small sure seems to go a long way towards helping others live better lives
lenders.occupational_info: I'm fortunate to live in California and the U.S.A., and have prospered enough enabling me to help others.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I have no good reason not to!

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: It's something I can do to make a specific, tangible difference in someone's life. I was born dirt poor, and would not be where I am now without the help of others when I was less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I write fiction books.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I have it and they need it.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: it's just a really good idea.  Helping "neighbours" who want to work to become economically sound makes my life better.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mathematics and computer courses.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this life together.

lenders.name: carol
lenders.loan_because: A housefire made me realize how much I had and how little I really needed - and Kiva shows me how I can so easily help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a college bookstore company.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate in the world, and those who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I track, budget, and analyze sales revenue and expenses for a $30 million insecticide business.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: Compared to how the rest of the world lives I am RICH.  We have a two-person, no-kid (but lots of rescued cats) household so I spend a lot of my "disposable income" on charities, primarily animal welfare.  This is my first foray into social causes.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: it is important to help people help themselves. One never knows what impact a simple gesture of good will may have in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide anesthesia for patients who need surgery and pain relief for women in labor. I love my work because it involves compassionate care of people at a time when they are stressed. I find the scientific basis of what I do very interesting and enjoy the technical challenges.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I can, should, and must. :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that creates computer-based training, mostly for the U.S. government.

lenders.name: Mary C.
lenders.loan_because: It is important to support people in developing nations who are trying the help themselves and ultimately their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach social science and business courses to students who attend university online.

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do.  We waste so much money, not realising that that money could help a whole community.
lenders.occupational_info: I run training courses to help women feel better about themselves.  I teach about self confidence, feeling good, being happy and living a good life.

lenders.name: Terrance
lenders.occupational_info: I can't cause I don't.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I had money in my savings account.

lenders.name: Xeon
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others around the world.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: a loan might help someone else do good for yet other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a poet, a musician, and a university teacher.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling that comes from knowing that I can make a difference in someone's life. I think encouraging more entrepreneurship is the way to go.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing financial advice to small businesses.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: Even taking the smallest step will change the world, if we all work together.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a business consulting firm that works with businesses to develop renewable energy systems and government agencies and the private sector to develop energy efficiency programs and training.

lenders.name: Family
lenders.loan_because: the world has given so much to me.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family of surgeons, physicians, musicians, poets, animal lovers, writers and travelers.

lenders.name: Donald and Monnica
lenders.occupational_info: College Professor and daughter team

lenders.name: David Podger
lenders.occupational_info: I help good people find good jobs, & good employers hire good employees.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I have so much...

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I can and I care
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a sales exeutive for a non-profit - "Digital Divide Data" that provides jobs and education for disadvantaged and disabled young people in Cambodia and Laos.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: A little goes a long way!
lenders.occupational_info: Naturopathic Medicine

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: Because free charity to people that can work only perpetuates poverty thinking

lenders.name: ANDRES
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me to bless others..
lenders.occupational_info: Very difficult...

lenders.name: Kasey
lenders.loan_because: My aunt and uncle actually gave me a gift card for this, I thought it was an awesome idea and it feels great to know you are impacting someone's life! Let's keep it up!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student in highschool

lenders.name: Andrew Johnson
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Prachin
lenders.loan_because: when you make money you have to learn to give it back too.
lenders.occupational_info: hardwork results to resolution of any kind of problem

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Life is unfair, and I am a beneficiary of this unfairness.  Kiva is an easy way to redress a very, very small bit of this inequity.

lenders.name: Adriatic Granite
lenders.loan_because: God sees us all as equals, it is up to each one of us to do the right thing.

lenders.name: Matti
lenders.loan_because: I want to make an effort and spread the good.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to see people succeed in their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach middle school science.

lenders.name: Nathan & Lisa
lenders.loan_because: If I can help someone, I will.
lenders.occupational_info: Creative Director

lenders.name: Pragathi mahila
lenders.loan_because: We are giving training programs for different ages woma.we need some materian so we need loan
lenders.occupational_info: our trainings give to stand their life.

lenders.name: Trimbitas Sorin
lenders.loan_because: I like helping others. I hope that all the people from kiva to which we all loan will get their dreams up&running.
lenders.occupational_info: writing web applications and doing websites.

lenders.name: Simon Manikkam
lenders.loan_because: I make more Money that I need so id like to see the extra go to someone that needs it more that i do.
lenders.occupational_info: Sound Video Lighting

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I was a Vietnam War Combat Infantryman and I've seen what people in 3rd world countries face. Kiva gives me a sense of well being and somehow helps me deal with the past from the war. I was in the Chu Lai, Vietnam area in 1968-69.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired machinery repair supervisor. I worked in the chemical industry for 34 years.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because:
We all have the potential to create the lifestyle we desire, but for some of us the lack of funds and support infrastructure is too big a challenge to overcome without help from those who can.

I can and I am grateful for the opportunity to provide assistance for ambitious people with those challenges to take action to create a better lifestyle for themselves and their families.

They are the people who help change the world for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I inspire people to strike a balance between following your heart and gaining clarity to take action to create the life of their dreams using music to convey my message.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: i want to help women to be independent.
lenders.occupational_info: i develop system applications for the financial sector.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: Its one of the most reasonable and effective ways to better the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I dont work right now, but I attend school. My previous job was tutoring, which is helping younger students learn their material better.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if everyone in the world gave just a little bit, we could make a difference for our future and the futures of our children and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people new things to help them get even better at their jobs.

lenders.name: Family Lindqvist
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people to support other people.

lenders.name: WeiMin
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way to heal the downward spiral of poverty through self-help.
lenders.occupational_info: To help the least, the last and the lost.

lenders.name: dangerous
lenders.loan_because: increase my positiveness
lenders.occupational_info: Nothing

lenders.name: Debra and Chris
lenders.loan_because: I just learned about this micro loan idea and think it is wonderful.  It's not a hand out, it's a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I have owned a family restaurant with my parents for 30 years.

lenders.loan_because: i like to help people if i can

lenders.loan_because: I believe in you.
lenders.occupational_info: I help terminally ill people to live as well as they can until they die

lenders.name: Chip Hayner
lenders.loan_because: As a part of the wealthiest 1% in the world, I feel that it is our responsibility to help those out who could greatly benefit from our financial help.  What might mean a nice lunch for me, could mean the difference between a failing and thriving business for them.
lenders.occupational_info: The company I work for plans, designs, and develops websites for other companies, schools, and non-profit organizations.  Our goal is to help these organizations to maximize their potential through the use of the internet.

lenders.name: Gope Earthling
lenders.occupational_info: WORK with the philosophy of Connecting with Souls attracting Similar thoughts, for mutual benefits & connect Life / World best.

lenders.name: Tapio
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microloans is better option than development aid for helping people. Helping small businesses is good step for better world

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me.

lenders.name: Jev
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and I can do it.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: It's a good idea helping out those that really want to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work day to day with computers and helping computer users.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to help in a more personal way.
lenders.occupational_info: I make medicine.

lenders.name: Markus
lenders.occupational_info: I do web research.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit's innate desire to succeed and build a better life for oneself. Given the opportunity to succeed sometimes requires a little help and faith from others- I hope I can contribute to the quality of life for those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell biological tissue in the Operating Room so that General and Plastic Surgeons can repair complex abdominal wall defects and do breast reconstruction after a mastectomy.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because:
It's one way of helping others to help themselves - in a way which empowers and gives dignity.

It's too simple not to.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: We believe gaining financial indepence is enduring and far reaching.

lenders.name: Mandy
lenders.loan_because: I want people to be free to pursue their dreams, and experience the freedom, empowerment, confidence, opportunity, and sense of well-being that owning a successful business can bring. :)

lenders.name: Inge
lenders.occupational_info: I am a coordinator in a school for children with special needs.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I believe you help people out by helping them up
lenders.occupational_info: I run a factory that produces product used in the confectionary industry

lenders.loan_because: There is no way of making a better world than to give someone the opportunity to improve their chances in life.
